description: Foreign Minister Colonna said on a visit to Israel that too many civilians were being killed.
maintext: In a joint article in the Sunday Times, Lord Cameron said he supported a ceasefire only if it was sustainable in the long term. Although this marks a shift in tone from the UK government, it does not go as far as calling for an immediate ceasefire.
title: France calls for 'immediate and durable' ceasefire in Gaza
